title: Phase 14 – Memory Fusion, Strategic Alignment, Role Negotiation
description: This phase builds deep long-term coordination across agents by merging memory cores, resolving overlapping strategies, and inferring mission alignment.
objectives: Design memory fusion mechanism between overlapping agents
Unify strategic intent heuristics for roadmap and task goals
Log and converge conflicting strategies into common policies
Build a mission-aligned protocol for agent reasoning autonomy
next_steps: Draft memory fusion schema and routing hooks
Review all role overlap and redundancy logs
Simulate negotiation for strategic protocol unification
